guarantees future of Windsor minivan plant Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne guaranteed the future of the company's Windsor assembly plant even as the next generation minivan will be sold under only one of the Chrysler or Dodge brands The future of this plant is without a doubt guaranteed, Sergio Marchionne said today during a ceremony marking the production launch of the 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan. lined up against any change in benefits for Social Security and have begun warning Barack Obama to avoid the entitlement debate in his State of the Union address. Sen. Bernie Sanders says he counts Harry Reid among his allies in this fight: The battle lines are forming within the Democratic Party over the charged question of reforming Social Security in the days leading up to Barack Obama 's State of the Union address. . Zahi Hawass wrote, in a post to his Web site, which, due to the blocked Internet access at the time, he had to fax to colleagues in Italy to upload: My heart is broken and my blood is boiling. I feel that everything I have done in the last nine years has been destroyed in one day, but all the inspectors, young archaeologists, and administrators, are calling me from sites and museums all over Egypt to tell me that they will give their life to protect our antiquities. Alertsite was at Interop 2010 NYC and gave InformationWeekTV a demo of how its ability to test Web application performance from anywhere in the world can now be used to test the performance of the mobile end-users experience. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
